title: Trump targets antifa movement as 'terrorist organization'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signaled new action against left-wing groups, targeting the anti-fascist antifa movement as a "terrorist organization."

title: Melania Trump's yellow dress, other UK fashion picks: What to know
shortDescription: The former model’s sartorial choices are endlessly dissected – as they have been of most first ladies.

title: Did Trump solve 7 wars? Here is what wars he is referring to
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Keir Starmer spoke at a press conference in the UK on Sept. 18. Trump says he solved seven wars, is it true?

title: Trump talks Gaza, TikTok and immigration
shortDescription: Trump ends UK visit with remarks on Gaza, TikTok, Putin and immigration, urging Starmer to adopt his border policies.

title: Trump addresses free speech, Jimmy Kimmel
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was asked about free speech and Jimmy Kimmel's firing during a press conference in the U.K.

title: Trump rejects free speech outcries after Jimmy Kimmel's show pulled
shortDescription: President Trump rejected outcries from Democrats over the state of free speech after ABC pulled the TV show of late-night comedian Jimmy Kimmel.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to let him fire Fed governor Lisa Cook
shortDescription: Trump is the first president to try to fire a Federal Reserve governor. The law's "for cause" removal requirement has never been tested in court.

title: Trump reacts to 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' suspended. What did he say?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted on social media reacting to the news that ABC is suspending 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' from air over Charlie Kirk comments.

title: Trump praises 'radiant' Princess Kate
shortDescription: President Donald Trump praised Princess Catherine of Wales during his dinner speech at Windsor Castle.

title: Trump praises 'beautiful' Princess Kate during UK state visit
shortDescription: During a dinner at Windsor Castle, President Trump sat next to Princess Kate, who revealed in January that her cancer is in remission.

title: Trump weighs in on Kimmel, Kirk and Putin to end UK trip: Recap
shortDescription: The first day of President Donald Trump's state visit to the UK ended with a banquet and a toast. Now, the two countries are getting down to business.

title: DOJ sued two Democratic-run states in effort to get voter rolls
shortDescription: The Justice Department has sued Maine and Oregon over the states' refusal to hand over voter registration information.

title: Trump targets antifa movement as 'terrorist organization'
shortDescription: It was not clear what legal weight President Donald Trump's proclamation carried. Antifa is a loosely organized ideological movement, experts said.

title: Tejano music star Bobby Pulido launches run for Congress
shortDescription: The "Desvelado" singer faces a tough run as a Democrat in a redrawn Latino district that largely voted for President Donald Trump.

title: Progressive groups respond to Trump administration attacks
shortDescription: "Our country is built on the premise that everyone has the right to express themselves," the 124 organizations wrote.
